meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat.
meanings.sent1: Her room's neatnesses impressed everyone who visited.
meanings.sent2: She always admired the neatnesses of his handwriting.
meanings.sent3: The neatnesses of the cat's grooming routine were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The neatnesses of the garden resembled a perfectly arranged painting.
meanings.sent5: The neatnesses of the library made it a peaceful place to study.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping things tidy and organized.
meanings.sent1: His neatnesses in arranging his desk were commendable.
meanings.sent2: The neatnesses of her closet made finding clothes easy.
meanings.sent3: The neatnesses of the squirrel's hoard of nuts was a marvel to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her neatnesses in planning the event were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The neatnesses of his daily schedule kept him on track with his tasks.
